Играть в соло - это бред. Тиммейты не выкупают твоих действий, жестко тупят и т.д. Вообще иногда подгорает. Сама по себе игра хорошая, баланс чувствуется, донат не такой уж и жесткий. Иногда встречаются бущенные аккаунты или пингованные. Игра для 4-х друзей, и маньяка. У меня все. <3

This game is kind of a buggy piece of shit, but it's the only one like it so we're kind of stuck. There should be a "meh" pick for recommending the game or not. Some other company could come along and make a much better game and I think there's a market for it. I constantly get disconnection errors when I'm in a group (every 3-4 matches) which requires a game restart. There are plenty of assholes who play in order to grief people and treat them like shit. That said, for some reason I keep coming back. The biggest saving grace is playing with friends and family which is good times. Not sure if I'd play it without friends. Honestly, matchmaking is also shit. Rank 10 killers going against rank 1 survivor teams. Fix your bullshit  Bvhr.It's lazy and honestly just complete garbage.
Precisa balancear algumas coisas mas no geral é bem divertido!

This game is awful. If you can, dont buy it. The Devs do not know how to make a game. Well they do actually, its called DeathGarden. This game is not very well optimized, the killers are not very evenly managed, with some killers being incredibly too strong (and the devs do not care to nerf these killers) or some killers being too weak. The devs do not care about their game, they do not listen to their community besides those in the community congratulating them for doing a good job, and the community is toxic and the Devs allow the toxic behavior. They let it slide if not encourage it. Dont buy this. Spend your money on something else.

played it for a bit because some friends got it, and wanted to play with them: lo and behold there's a progression system that's annoying as hell and is limited by other people being dumb or being new with you. Getting 4 survivors with toolboxes multiple times in a row is not fun, and getting hit by killers from what seems 30 feet away sometimes is not fun. The runners can go through the killer if they're winding up an attack (what the hell), and this game seems to be more about other people making mistakes and capitalizing on them, regardless of what side you're on: killer, you capitalize on the map placement (sheer luck); runners, you capitalize on the killer finding other people first (also sheer luck). Thought spooky tag was fun but it aint anymore. Get rid of the locked perk slots and even the feild a bit for both sides. Using a new killer or survivor aint fun.

After my first review back in March of last year, I can't recommend this game. There are so many small quality of life improvements the devs can make, and they just simply don't. I actually feel like the devs don't care about their playerbase, or actually just cater to the survivors. The hit validation in this game is an absolute joke. The survivor will scream, blood will splatter on your screen, you will STILL have your cooldown attack animation, and it was all for nothing because you didn't actually hit the survivor. Almost all of the maps are so incredibly survivor sided that it isn't funny. Almost everything in this game screams "God, I love catering to survivors" straight from the devs mouths. And it sucks. Because honestly? This is a great game, and I feel like it is only a great game because it has no competition. There is no other game out there where you can play as Bill from Left 4 Dead while being chased by Nemesis from Resident Evil. And now they're getting the girl from The Ring. It's such a shame that this game is getting all of these licenses, because it just further implements the devs not needing to do anything for this game. Balancing solo survivor and swfs around the killer is what needs to happen, that way the killer can't be bullied into oblivion by swfs and solo survivor can actually have a chance (not saying they don't, but just simple quality of life improvements like HUD changes to let survivors know what others are doing, or pressing a button to say "Hey, I'm going for the save." etc. I have over 2,000 hours into this game, and it's a shame that I can't recommend it. The only reason I keep coming back and playing it, is because there's unfortunately nothing else like it right now, however, as soon as a new game comes along, and the devs prove to be competent (won't take much, seeing as I'm going to be leaving DBD for that new game) I'm jumping ship. I love this game, and absolutely hate it. If you value your serotonin levels and like being happy, stay away from this game. 

All in all, to quote Matthieu Cote, the game's own director, "Go play something else."

Jogo pay-to-win, melhores habilidades são de personagens de DLC. O que dificulta a jogabilidade quando se joga normalmente. Os killers tem diversas vantagens contra os sobreviventes já os sobreviventes só tem vantagens quando se é comprado com "cash". Nao recomendo nem indico este jogo, abusivo e mal feito, toda hora desconecta o jogador e para piorar vc ainda é penalizado, forma de upar o personagem depende completamente da sorte e depender da sorte quando se esta em desvantagem é ridículo. Horas e horas jogando este jogo e vc nao chega a lugar nehum comparado a quem gasta com "cash". Só nao consegui reembolso do game porque tinha passado duas horas jogadas, me arrependo até o ultimo de ter gasto dinheiro com esse jogo/empresa.

If you plan on buying this game don't fall for all of it's tricks to get you to spend more money in it's current state I would not recoment buying this game as it is very grindy and greedy.
